California's supermax prisons were
designed in the 1980s for isolation and
mass incarceration in an era of rampant
prison gang violence but two-thirds of
inmates now riaf end and the system is
under review those who experience
solitary believe it's flawed after being
held in Iran for more than two years the
American hikers captured and held by
Iranian authorities on the Iraq border
were deeply affected by that time behind
bars Shane Bauer and Sarah Shourd say
the US holds more people in solitary for
longer than Iran and have joined the
campaign against prison isolation Sarah
was held in solitary for 410 days it
helped me understand why solitary
confinement is psychological torture and
its use damages people in ways that they
often never recover whatever the
definition of solitary confinement the
suicide rate among prisoners who'd been
isolated for long periods is greater
than for others the UN still wants
access to California's jails and the
court cases continue as change slowly
comes to perhaps America's most
scrutinized prison service
